TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping extends System.Object

summary.span: 定义 实例的数据源中的列与该实例的目标表中的列之间的映射。

span.span: Defines the mapping between a column in a instance's data source and a column in the instance's destination table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列映射定义数据源和目标表之间的映射。Column mappings define the mapping between data source and the target table. 如果未定义映射（即， 集合为空），则根据序号位置隐式映射列。If mappings are not defined - that is, the collection is empty - the columns are mapped implicitly based on ordinal position. 对于这种方式，源架构和目标架构必须匹配。For this to work, source and target schemas must match. 否则，会引发 。If they do not, an will be thrown. 如果 集合不为空，则必须指定数据源中存在的每一列。If the collection is not empty, not every column present in the data source has to be specified. 被忽略的不是由集合映射的。Those not mapped by the collection are ignored. 可以按名称或序号引用源列和目标列。You can refer to source and target columns by either name or ordinal. 你还可以在同一映射集合中混合按名称和按顺序的列引用。You can also mix by-name and by-ordinal column references in the same mappings collection. ## Examples 下面的示例将数据从**AdventureWorks**示例数据库中的源表大容量复制到同一个数据库中的目标表。The following example bulk copies data from a source table in the **AdventureWorks** sample database to a destination table in the same database. 尽管目标中的列数与源中的列数匹配，并且每个目标列与相应的源列处于相同的序号位置，但列名称不匹配。Although the number of columns in the destination matches the number of columns in the source, and each destination column is in the same ordinal position as its corresponding source column, the column names do not match. 对象用于创建大容量复制的列映射。 objects are used to create a column map for the bulk copy. > [!IMPORTANT] > 除非已按照[大容量复制示例设置](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup)中所述创建了工作表，否则此示例将不会运行。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup). 提供此代码是为了演示仅使用 SqlBulkCopy 时的语法。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源表和目标表位于同一个 SQL Server 实例中，则使用 Transact-sql `INSERT … SELECT` 语句复制数据会更加简单快捷。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMapping#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMapping/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMapping#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMapping/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 用于初始化新的 对象的无参数构造函数。

span.span: Parameterless constructor that initializes a new object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用此构造函数，则必须使用 属性或 属性定义映射的源，并使用 属性或 属性定义映射的目标。If you use this constructor, you must then define the source for the mapping using the property or the property, and define the destination for the mapping using the property or the property. ## Examples 下面的示例将数据从**AdventureWorks**示例数据库中的源表大容量复制到同一个数据库中的目标表。The following example bulk copies data from a source table in the **AdventureWorks** sample database to a destination table in the same database. 尽管目标中的列数与源中的列数匹配，但列名称和序号位置不匹配。Although the number of columns in the destination matches the number of columns in the source, the column names and ordinal positions do not match. 对象用于创建大容量复制的列映射。 objects are used to create a column map for the bulk copy. > [!IMPORTANT] > 除非已按照[大容量复制示例设置](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup)中所述创建了工作表，否则此示例将不会运行。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup). 提供此代码是为了演示仅使用 SqlBulkCopy 时的语法。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源表和目标表位于同一个 SQL Server 实例中，则使用 Transact-sql `INSERT … SELECT` 语句复制数据会更加简单快捷。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMapping#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMapping/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMapping#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMapping/VB/source.vb#1)]

Public Sub New (sourceColumnOrdinal As Integer, destinationOrdinal As Integer)

param.name: sourceColumnOrdinal
param.span: 数据源中源列的序号位置。

span.span: The ordinal position of the source column within the data source.

param.span: 目标表中目标列的序号位置。

summary.span: 创建新的列映射，并使用列序号引用源列和目标列。

span.span: Creates a new column mapping, using column ordinals to refer to source and destination columns.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例将数据从**AdventureWorks**示例数据库中的源表大容量复制到同一个数据库中的目标表。The following example bulk copies data from a source table in the **AdventureWorks** sample database to a destination table in the same database. 尽管目标中的列数与源中的列数匹配，但列名称和序号位置不匹配。Although the number of columns in the destination matches the number of columns in the source, the column names and ordinal positions do not match. 对象用于基于列的序号位置创建大容量复制的列映射。 objects are used to create a column map for the bulk copy based on the ordinal positions of the columns. > [!IMPORTANT] > 除非已按照[大容量复制示例设置](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup)中所述创建了工作表，否则此示例将不会运行。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup). 提供此代码是为了演示仅使用 SqlBulkCopy 时的语法。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源表和目标表位于同一个 SQL Server 实例中，则使用 Transact-sql `INSERT … SELECT` 语句复制数据会更加简单快捷。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingOrdinal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingOrdinal/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingOrdinal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingOrdinal/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和 属性互相排斥。The and properties are mutually exclusive. 最后设置的值优先。The last value set takes precedence. ## Examples 下面的示例将数据从**AdventureWorks**示例数据库中的源表大容量复制到同一个数据库中的目标表。The following example bulk copies data from a source table in the **AdventureWorks** sample database to a destination table in the same database. 尽管目标中的列数与源中的列数匹配，但列名称和序号位置不匹配。Although the number of columns in the destination matches the number of columns in the source, the column names and ordinal positions do not match. 对象用于创建大容量复制的列映射。 objects are used to create a column map for the bulk copy. > [!IMPORTANT] > 除非已按照[大容量复制示例设置](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup)中所述创建了工作表，否则此示例将不会运行。This sample will not run unless you have created the work tables as described in [Bulk Copy Example Setup](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/sql/bulk-copy-example-setup). 提供此代码是为了演示仅使用 SqlBulkCopy 时的语法。This code is provided to demonstrate the syntax for using **SqlBulkCopy** only. 如果源表和目标表位于同一个 SQL Server 实例中，则使用 Transact-sql `INSERT … SELECT` 语句复制数据会更加简单快捷。If the source and destination tables are in the same SQL Server instance, it is easier and faster to use a Transact-SQL `INSERT … SELECT` statement to copy the data. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingDestinationColumn#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingDestinationColumn/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingDestinationColumn#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappingDestinationColumn/VB/source.vb#1)]
